mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Is Our Command! Because you deserve it all."

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into the Bank of Entitlement with my usual swagger, ready to make a simple withdrawal. As I sauntered up to the teller, I announced, "I demand to speak with the bank manager immediately!" The teller's eyes widened in shock, but she knew better than to question me. Within moments, the manager, trembling in fear, emerged from his office. I leaned in, whispering dramatically, "I require my cash withdrawal to be handed to me on a silver platter, complete with a red carpet rollout." The manager hesitated for a split second before scurrying off to fulfill my outlandish request. Minutes later, the teller returned with a literal silver platter, adorned with my cash in neat stacks, and a red carpet unfurled at my feet. The other customers watched in disbelief, but I basked in the attention, feeling utterly entitled to this grand display. As I swept up my cash, I declared loudly, "This is how a true VIP is treated!" Walking out of the bank, feeling like royalty, I couldn't help but chuckle at the absurdity of it all. But deep down, I knew I deserved every moment of that extravagant display. Ah, the joys of being me!
